data.approach: The TasksOpen component has its own rocket button implementation that does not use TaskActionButton, so it lacks the Alt+click agent picker functionality. Will update TasksOpen to either use TaskActionButton or add the same Alt key detection and AgentSelector integration that TaskActionButton has.

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Alt Key Menu Functionality
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the new alt key menu interaction in the ActionPill component. Verify that the launch menu appears correctly when alt is pressed, checks for different browser/OS interactions, and ensures consistent behavior across different task view contexts.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability of newly implemented interaction mechanism

suggestedTasks.title: Document Alt Key Menu Interaction Pattern
suggestedTasks.description: Update developer documentation to explain the new alt key menu interaction pattern. Include details about where and how this interaction is implemented, expected user experience, and any design guidelines for similar interactions in other components.
suggestedTasks.reason: Provide clear guidance for future component implementations

gotchas: Ensure cross-browser compatibility for alt key detection
